item.description:
The Revolve Nation Entrepreneurs Network is the largest community of entrepreneurs and business owners in the city of Boston, offering
networking, discussion groups, seminars, business plan hot-seats, and more! Join us here, where professionals and entrepreneurs meet in mutual support of business to network, socialize, learn, and promote a thriving community of entrepreneurs. Wine and snacks provided!

This month's seminar will focus on Trademark Law and how it specifically applies to those who create and sculpt logos in the branding and marketing industry more broadly. As you may know, after you perfect a logo or full brand for your clients, a Trademark is the final tool your clients will need to leverage the brand you created as she attempts to expand her operations or value her business.

Schedule:
6pm-6:30pm -- Open Networking over wine and snacks
6:30-7:00pm -- Overview of what exactly Trademark Law is, what can be trademarked and how you can provide additional value to your clients by paving the way for your clients to leverage the brands you develop for them.
7:00-7:30pm -- Q&A
7:30-8pm -- More Networking! (and wine!)


Sponsors:
Revolve, Inc.: www.RevolveThis.com

Exemplar Law Partners: www.exemplarlaw.com

See all of you next time!
item.name: Logo-Aid: Trademark Law Crash Course for Graphic Designers
